title: #221 - Tom & Christina P
description: On this episode of the H3 Podcast friends of the show Tom Segura and Christina P zoom in to hang out! Together we talk about parenting, angry racist fathers, the debate, Vin Diesel of course, and a whole lot more!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
itunes:subtitle: On this episode of the H3 Podcast friends of the show Tom Segura and Christina P zoom in to hang out! Together we talk about parenting, angry racist fathers, the debate, Vin Diesel of course, and a whole lot more!
